title: Really Riot? The Braum Lionheart skin?
body: Thanks for not flipping the splash art....... so I can actually see him.... again... for the fourth time in a row...

replies.body: We realized this after it was released. D: It's on the radar to be adjusted!
can you fix the pink ward bug, where it doesn't find enemy wards in the baron pit.  It has happened to me twice now.

I think it's a general bug lol. I had a game last night where a pink ward was placed in a bush. The enemy put a ward in that bush, and it disappeared after 5 seconds and never reappeared, although it did with sweeper. It still distributed the gold between me and the pink owner, however... Pink ward isn't working 100% as intended.

YES, i found it with a sweeper as well, they definitely need to fix this bug though, it seems as if they aren't aware of it even.  I demand to know whether or not the enemy has vision of baron... it's game changing.
It's a bug. They are working on fixing it
